response.original_title: The Hobbit: The Desolation Of Smaug (Extended Edition)
response.overview: The prequel trilogy to Peter Jackson's The Lord Of The Rings. On their journey to reclaim their homeland, The Dwarves end up stirring trouble with Spiders, Orcs, Elves, and mankind themselves as young Hobbit, Bilbo, and company approach nearby Laketown. With the Kingdom in sight, they accidentally awaken Smaug, the dragon, as desolation falls upon all. Will the Dwarves get their home back? Will Laketown survive? How will they escape the Elves and Orcs? Time will tell.
response.tagline: Will Bilbo and company reclaim the Dwarven Kingdom? Or will all perish at The Desolation Of Smaug?
response.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation Of Smaug (Extended Edition)

release_dates.note: Bonus features are probably what make it a 15 rated disc
